name: Toothbrush
title: Elmex Sensitive Professional · Toothbrush · Extra soft

usageInformation.usage: Dental professionals recommend replacing the toothbrush every 3 months and after infectious diseases, as well as after wear.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: The elmex Sensitive Professional Extra Soft toothbrush is the perfect choice if you suffer from pain-sensitive teeth and sensitive gums. The pleasantly soft, conically tapered and rounded filaments of the elmex Sensitive Professional toothbrush have been combined with higher X bristles that are at an optimal angle to each other. This means that even the hard-to-reach interdental spaces are cleaned particularly cleanly and thoroughly. The pleasant structure of the bristles ensures a particularly gentle toothbrushing experience - even for exposed tooth necks and an overall sensitive oral cavity. The ergonomically shaped handle of the elmex Sensitive Professional Extra Soft toothbrush features a sophisticated design and is wonderfully comfortable to hold. This makes daily dental hygiene not only particularly effective, but also really fun. Treat your teeth and gums to optimum care day after day: with the elmex Sensitive Professional toothbrush with extra soft bristles, you benefit from efficient brushing performance, gentle and intensive cleaning, a sophisticated design and the usual first-class workmanship of the quality manufacturer. Our tip: To round off your dental care routine and complement the Sensitive Professional toothbrush, use elmex Sensitive toothpaste and treat yourself and your family to the best care experience.
